name: Man Wreck
description: An imp wants to be promoted into an incubus. He needs to undergo a test: turning a town of men into willing subjects of Hell. This means there are obstacles to clear, and there are a lot of seduction/tricks to be played. An adult visual novel that explores many heavy kinks in gay fantasies, this game faces taboos head on. A simple puzzle system provides some casual fun in between story progressions.
